original_text: Then some men arrived. They were carrying a man on a mat. The man could not walk or move his legs. They tried to get into the house because they wanted to bring the man to Jesus.
korean_text: 한 중풍병자를 사람들이 침상에 메고 와서 예수 앞에 들여놓고자 하였으나

sentences.original_text: They were carrying a man on a mat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 한 사람을 돗자리에 매어 운반하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He could not move his legs.
They tried to get into the house.
They wanted to bring the man to Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 남자를 예수께 데려가고 싶었습니다.
